name: Emblem of Valor
desc:
A commemorative portrait of you and your companions, which you obtained after assisting the combat readiness liaison Irade with stage certification.
According to her, after having been crafted by three masters and certified by you, the stages may now have reached such a level of perfection as to require no further iteration. They will surely become the first port of call for warriors looking to challenge themselves and hone their martial prowess...

value.text: Version 5.3 Event - Emblem of Steadfast Valor

desc.text:
No matter how the environment changes, a warrior's fighting spirit burns eternal, and the pursuit of martial perfection knows no rest.
Following in the wake of time and tradition, "Baraka" Xilonen of the Nanatzcayan, "Malipo" Kinich of the Huitztlan, and "Vuka" Chasca of the Tlalocan — great warriors all — have designed a whole new set of Tune-Up Goals, to guide us on the path to prowess and self-betterment. What's more, these challenges have been granted the highest recognition from the most venerable Tumaini!
Warriors! Great heroes have gone before you, now follow their examples and strive to break the limits of the horizon.
